body:
Hey there,
Quintessential eSports have officially opened up applications and trials for 2016. This time around, there will be two teams - a core team and a sister team. We are currently looking for a starting **TOP and SUPPORT**. After placing 9th in the OCS Qualifier Invitational and not obtaining an OCS Spot, we have decided to restart our team and find players who have potentially to be the best in their respective roles. We are looking for players who are highly mechanical with a positive attitude to fit into a clean team environment. Our goal for this year is to reach OCS and potentially OPL.

The requirements are as followed:
‚¶Å DiamondV+ in Season 5
‚¶Å Atleast 17 years old
‚¶Å Available to practice 4 times a week from 6PM AEST time
‚¶Å High and strong champion pool in respected lane
‚¶Å Positive and professional attitude
‚¶Å Proper Hardware and Internet Connection (mic, webcam etc..) with teamspeak
‚¶Å Ability to give and receive constructive criticism and work within a clean and productive team environment

In return, QTE will provide:
‚¶Å Team bonus for making it into the challenger series
‚¶Å Reimbursed pro level play
‚¶Å Professional and dedicated environment
‚¶Å Managed daily trainings and dedicated communication channels
‚¶Å Managed weekly analyst and/or a coach sessions (likely several times a week)
‚¶Å A Management Team that is committed to helping players reach their full potential
‚¶Å A professional environment that has a strong support network
‚¶Å Support players and the team in attaining sponsorship
‚¶Å Legal framework to ensure a committed team
‚¶Å Timetabling to maximise team training

>To apply for the team, please send fill out the form:[ QTE Application Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1awNWabIYOV-raYJEckcms2q4EcwDiz0uIU153_kp7VI/viewform?c=0&w=1)
Or feel free to add me on client [Hoodlum], if there are any questions.

Thanks,
QTE Management Team [Hoodlum]
